publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4894 Fergus Ewing: Kilchoan School Eco Award—That the Parliament congratulates the nine pupils of Kilchoan Primary School, Ardnamurchan, who have been awarded an Eco Schools Bronze Award for creating a new school garden and working to stop litter in the school and the community and currently are working on a recycling project; believes that this award is a credit to both the pupils and the school staff and to their community, and further congratulates the Eco Schools Scotland scheme on its success which now has over 77% of Scotland’s local authority schools participating, involving over 642,000 pupils and 40,500 teachers in Eco Schools work throughout Scotland, raising awareness about environmental and sustainable development issues and encouraging young people to take action locally.

S2M-4894 Kilchoan School Eco Award (lodged on 29 September 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Jim Mather*, Christine Grahame*, Bruce Crawford*, Brian Adam*, Fiona Hyslop*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4894 Kilchoan School Eco Award (lodged on 29 September 2006) Dave Petrie*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Jamie Stone*, John Swinburne*, Maureen Macmillan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4894 Kilchoan School Eco Award (lodged on 29 September 2006) Eleanor Scott*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Shiona Baird*, Richard Lochhead*, Robin Harper*
